content: granny triangle scarf granny triangle scarf written by jamie louise granny triangle scarf by jamie louise materials 1 caron cake or 383 yards in acrylic worsted weight yarn i 5 5mm or j 6 0mm hook abbrevations chain- chain double_crochet- double_crochet treble_crochet- triple/treble_crochet mc- magic_ring notes about pattern -scarves are typically 30-35 row in length depending on desired size -each row will increase in the center space row 1 in a mc ch4 3dc ch1 3dc ch1 double_crochet row 2 ch4 and turn 3dc in 1st space ch1 3dc ch1 in next ch1 space 3dc ch1 3dc ch1 in center space 3dc ch1 1dc in last space row 3-9 ch4 and turn 3dc in 1st space ch1 3dc ch1 in each ch1 space until you reach the center in center space 3dc ch1 3dc ch1 continue with 3dc ch1 in each ch1 space in the last space of the row 3dc ch1 1dc row 10-35 or desired length ch5 and turn 3tr in 1st space ch1 3dc ch1 in each ch1 space until you reach the center in center space 3dc ch1 3dc ch1 continue with 3dc ch1 in each ch1 space in the last space of the row 3tr ch1 1tr after you achieve your desired length cut twenty x 20inch strands of yarn tie 10 strands into a tassel on either end of scarf
